author: Jason Murdock
title: Online Stimulus Check Scams Are On the Rise—Here's How to Stay Protected
description: "Fake stimulus check scams could be very successful considering the financial chaos coronavirus has unleashed on families worldwide," one top malware researcher told Newsweek.
content:
In the coming weeks, money from a federal stimulus package is expected to start hitting Americans' bank accountsand scammers are already using it as a lure in criminal campaigns.
Fraudsters are currently posing as government officials and reaching out to pot… [+5913 chars]
